attributes.action: Help eradicate fuel poverty by installing wind turbines and solar photovoltaic panels to homes of those at risk of fuel poverty and at risk groups free of charge.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would include people in social housing (council properties) and would be done free of charge. this would have a two prongue benefit, a) to help those in/or near fuel poverty to cut their bills by the production of there own electricity and b) reduce the ammount of CO2 produced by this country. This could help with health, housing, environment, well being, reducing the ammount of poverty in UK and more.
